import { CommonModule } from "@angular/common"; import { Component } from "@angular/core"; @Component({ selector: "app-contact", standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule], templateUrl: "./contact.component.html", styleUrl: "./contact.component.css", }) export class ContactComponent {}
